data.title: Funeral Home in Jacksonville Florida
data.meta_description: Funerals by T.S. Warden is a licensed funeral home in Jacksonville, FL providing funeral and cremation services with personal care and respect to families.
data.text:
Welcome to the Funerals by T. S. Warden website. Whether you would like to learn more about planning a funeral or grief support, or you're just looking for general information on funeral arrangements, please feel free to look around. If you have any questions, we're available by phone, by email or in person. We want to be the Jacksonville funeral home that takes care of you.

It's not unusual to feel lost and alone after losing a loved one. Our Jacksonville funeral home provides grief support programs that can help you through this difficult time. Visit our Online Grief Resource Center here or call us at 904-765-1234.

Welcome to Our Funeral Home in Jacksonville, FL

Welcome to the Funerals By T.S. Warden website. Whether you would like to learn more about planning a funeral or grief support, or you are just looking for general information on funeral arrangements, please feel free to look around. If you have any questions, we are available by phone, by email, or in person. We want to be the Jacksonville funeral home that takes care of you. Each family that walks through our doors is treated like a family member. Our staff will invest in a relationship with you because we care for each family who chooses our funeral services. We are committed to operating ethically, which means respecting, caring, and servicing families to the best of our abilities.

Funerals By T.S. Warden offers traditional funeral services with burials and graveside services. You can count on our classic details that make the service meaningful, like limousine services, a horse-drawn hearse, or dove releases. Also, look into our green burial options for the environmentally conscious. We also offer cremation services. You may choose a direct cremation without a service, or cremation with a memorial ceremony is a popular selection. You can plan a memorial service weeks or months after a cremation, whichever is best for the family. Our funeral planning team can also arrange an ash scattering service at the location of your preference.

Life celebrations are a less conventional way to honor the life of your loved one, with the focus on light and casual atmospheres with music and dancing. Our team is ready to implement traditions surrounding military honors or veteran services with whichever format you choose.

Funerals By T.S. Warden is involved in the Jacksonville, Jacksonville Beach, Orange Park, Palm Coast, Neptune Beach, Hillard, Atlantic Beach, Fernandina Beach, Saint Augustine, Middleburg, Yulee, Green Cove, and Gainesville communities. Browse through our funeral products to find the most suitable urn, casket, vault, or memorial for your loved one.

At Funerals By T.S. Warden, our experience has taught us that when losing a loved one, those left behind feel lost and alone. Many do not know where to turn or how to cope. Our Jacksonville funeral home provides grief support programs that are dedicated to helping you during your difficult time and making each day a little easier for you when a loved one is lost. Visit one of our homes on Fernandina Beach or in Jacksonville. Or give us a call to schedule an appointment at (904) 765-1234.
